text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222592004 (null)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222593009 (null)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222594003 (null)

name: TNMStageGroupVS
title: TNM Stage Group Value Set
description: Result values for cancer stage group using TNM staging following AJCC staging guidelines. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of AJCC codes for Stage Group, according to TNM staging rules.
